reviewText: This is a pretty hot DVD of some behind-the-scenes at the Playboy Mansion. Needless to say, it's full of gorgeous, sexy women. The DVD runs 58 minutes, with the party scenes and body painting about equal duration. My favorite part is the body painting, where you get to see quite lengthy detail of the lucky artists painting "costumes" on the ladies. (Do they get paid to do that??) The Mansion Parties segment is fun too, but as another reviewer pointed out, it doesn't have the greatest production values. Actually, this DVD is a good companion to the DVD "Inside the Playboy Mansion," since that one gives just tantalizingly brief clips of the parties and body painting. Thus, this "Playboy Mansion Parties and Body Painting" DVD, as well as the DVD Playboy - Mansion Parties Totally Uncensored give you a much more detailed look at those activities.
